title: bowlacoin
author: bowlacoin
content: Hi All...Â  I am the Founder of the first crypto exchange there have internal shares...Â  Welcome to PyramidPRO. PyramidPRO is a (CDEX) Decentralized Exchange and LaunchPAD is built on a centralized platform to enhance security. First community share-based crypto exchange with affiliate marketing plan, 100% Decentralized staking, LaunchPAD, and stake to earn trading rewards.Â  We are just getting started, Affiliate platform and staking 100% ready and started, and the exchange and launchpad coming soon..Â  Â  Take a look at our website https://pyramidpro.com Â  Take a look at our last audit: https://coinsult.net/projects/pyramidpro/ Â  Explainer video all in 6 min: https://youtu.be/xa7N51-EJDk Â  Visit telegram: https://t.me/PyramidPRO_Family Â  Visit twitter: https://twitter.com/pyramidpro_netÂ  Meet us in Dubai to the Next crypto Expo in OCT  ðŸ‘‡ðŸ‘‡ðŸ‘‡ðŸ‘‡ðŸ‘‡ðŸ‘‡ðŸ‘‡ðŸ‘‡ðŸ‘‡ðŸ‘‡ðŸ‘‡ðŸ‘‡ðŸ‘‡ðŸ‘‡ðŸ‘‡ðŸ‘‡You can join the waiting list here for the exchange here, you can even earn FREE PPRO tokens. https://pyramidpro.com/wait-list.html?r=B4PQY Â        Right now we are also looking for: - Partners- Token/Coins for the exchange- Crypto AdvisorsIf you want to know more, send me a private message at telegram: @Supermip

comments.author: Goatbrian
comments.body: I love them, I have probably not been with for so long and have still only invested in the first 2 packages.And am saving together for the next package so I can get more shares. But already in 3 days I have been paid money to my wallet and I was surprised at how fast it went. I am used to when you ask for a payout so it often takes 1-2 weeks, and have also tried a company where I gave up when I had waited for 2 months for a small payout. But here went, yes I do not actually know how fast it went, but when I checked an hour later they were on my wallet I'm so looking forward to them getting the new exchange done. But already now their coins have doubled in value. Fuck I'm looking forward to it growing even more. Can only say one thing, I've damn finally found my shelf

comments.author: Despairo
comments.body: Quote from: bowlacoin on June 07, 2022, 11:24:26 AMPyramidPRO is a (CDEX) Decentralized Exchange and LaunchPAD is built on a centralized platform to enhance security. You're killing the purpose of decentralized because you're need to create an account in your exchanges, moreover you're asking KYC lol. There's no such decentralized and you're misleading people, I'd say this whole project is high likely unsuccessful. Nowadays most project doesn't really focus on their service, but they're want to collect as much money and information, like your project who haven't completed the exchange and planning to create token and wallet.Quote from: https://my.pyramidpro.net/terms-conditionPyramidPRO reserves the right to require supporting documentation demonstrating the ID is valid and belongs to the User. Failure to provide the required ID upon reaching one or both stated thresholds will result in a commission hold. PyramidPRO may adjust the threshold requirements based on the current situation of the User.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Your project will attract some readers because it contains something central and decentralized at the same time, but you kill the idea and you will fail because at some point the system must be central or decentralized.I think your system is called a distributed system, which is a more accurate description of what you are trying to promote.Also, a system that focuses on porn or its distribution more than fixing its concept is a big red indicator for me.

comments.author: bowlacoin
comments.body: Quote from: Despairo on June 10, 2022, 01:20:54 PMQuote from: bowlacoin on June 07, 2022, 11:24:26 AMPyramidPRO is a (CDEX) Decentralized Exchange and LaunchPAD is built on a centralized platform to enhance security. You're killing the purpose of decentralized because you're need to create an account in your exchanges, moreover you're asking KYC lol. There's no such decentralized and you're misleading people, I'd say this whole project is high likely unsuccessful. Nowadays most project doesn't really focus on their service, but they're want to collect as much money and information, like your project who haven't completed the exchange and planning to create token and wallet.Quote from: https://my.pyramidpro.net/terms-conditionPyramidPRO reserves the right to require supporting documentation demonstrating the ID is valid and belongs to the User. Failure to provide the required ID upon reaching one or both stated thresholds will result in a commission hold. PyramidPRO may adjust the threshold requirements based on the current situation of the User. you are absolutely wrong... and need to understand the concept here..Â  our decentralized part here is our users can hold their own money on their own private wallets. And we as exchanges don't need to hold millions of dollars in crypto. The Centralized part with login help to secure, even if YOU do lose your private keys, then who ever have access to your key ways cant access your orders, staking and more on our decentralized exchange, for the first step is you also need login to your profile before you can unstake, before you can cancel orders and more.also you are saying nowadays.... well I think you need to look forward in time and not on nowadays.Â  Â its a question about time before regulators finally regulate the crypto space, and all exchanger/ lending site and so on who is dealing with other people's money as service need to be regulated as well, and before that can happen KYC is a requirement if you want to be legal in as many counties you can, and to give the best support..we have already finished staking, the affiliate site and our Token. .. seems like you did not look deeper into our concept and just judgingÂ  I am agree mostly exchangers or even companies don't focus on their service, and that is one of our top priorities...

comments.author: bowlacoin
comments.body: Quote from: Despairo on June 10, 2022, 01:20:54 PMQuote from: bowlacoin on June 07, 2022, 11:24:26 AMPyramidPRO is a (CDEX) Decentralized Exchange and LaunchPAD is built on a centralized platform to enhance security. You're killing the purpose of decentralized because you're need to create an account in your exchanges, moreover you're asking KYC lol. Nowadays most project doesn't really focus on their service, but they're want to collect as much money and information, like your project who haven't completed the exchange and planning to create token and wallet.Quote from: https://my.pyramidpro.net/terms-conditionPyramidPRO reserves the right to require supporting documentation demonstrating the ID is valid and belongs to the User. Failure to provide the required ID upon reaching one or both stated thresholds will result in a commission hold. PyramidPRO may adjust the threshold requirements based on the current situation of the User. Your quote is your our internal share system, where we can ask users to send extra prof who they are. if you become shareholder of any exchange, I am VERY sure you also need to send information who you are, with ID and more.and if we only have as goal to collect money, who do we give 80% aways to our internal shareholders.. make no sense to me what you are saying...

comments.author: bowlacoin
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on June 11, 2022, 07:21:06 PMYour project will attract some readers because it contains something central and decentralized at the same time, but you kill the idea and you will fail because at some point the system must be central or decentralized.I think your system is called a distributed system, which is a more accurate description of what you are trying to promote.Also, a system that focuses on porn or its distribution more than fixing its concept is a big red indicator for me.Thanks for your comment... I am not killing the point of any decentralized thing here, we added an extra layer of user protection to secure user's orders, staking and more... also more and more countries require KYC, BANK details and more... We are NOT hiding who we are, and therefor we need to be sure who are on our exchange, we need follow the rules in the countries we register in. and it will also make it more easy when moving forward going into new countries.and not sure where you get the porn from... did you watch that? when you were writing your post here... hahaha... but anyway.. we do not focus on our affiliate part with internal share, its basic running itself, but it is a part of the exchange, and whoever has shares with us, is getting a part of the total revenue... i am very sure in any company where you are buying shares, you will also want to know how you get paid and for what and when. But we will keep people updated here or telegram next month when we have big news for the exchange.

First community share-based crypto exchange with affiliate marketing plan, 100% Decentralized staking, LaunchPAD, and stake to earn trading rewards. comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: Why the site is showing the bitcoin price at $30k and ETH at $2k?And why do you use the Decentralized word on a project with a Token Allocation?Team/Advisors 8%Crisis Donations 10%Liquidity 5%Ecosystem 10%Reserve 4%Staking 56.30%Token sale 6% (50% goes to Liquidity)Airdrop 0.70%In the video you forget to mention the part where you sell your 37% and walk away with the customer's money, this is how pyramids work right?It's easy for anyone to create a token for a $10 smart contract and use that to scam people. It's sad but true.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: What do you benefit from, as this combination of central and centralized transfers does not bring any benefit and a double necessity because it is an inaccurate hybrid of the problems of the two systems.Most people do not have projects like this or reality.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: I find on your website, that you present some of your partners. For example, one of them is Binance. Can you explain to me what exactly the partnership between you and Binance looks like? do you have any contract about all this and whether they know about the partnership with you?and I must say, the choice for the exchange's name "Pyramid...", it's a very bad decision. You took the most common synonym for financial fraud.

comments.author: Sabai Community
comments.body: Looking at your website it states your exchange is the first community share-based crypto exchange with affiliate marketing plan, 100% Decentralized staking, LaunchPAD, and stake to earn trading rewards. What makes your exchange different and standout from other exchanges with similar benefits.
